title: Add MagSafe and more to your iPhone 16e with these top cases
description: Whether you want rugged, slim, clear, colorful, MagSafe-compatible or something else, we help you find the best iPhone 16e case. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: David Snow
excerpt: Whether you want rugged, slim, clear, colorful, MagSafe-compatible or something else, we help you find the best iPhone 16e case.
text: Buying guides Dress up and protect your iPhone 16e. Photo: Cult of Mac If you got or will soon get an iPhone 16e, way to go! The new iPhone 16e has plenty to recommend it, even if lacks MagSafe and it’s not as affordable, at $599, as the discontinued SE model it replaces. iPhone 16e boasts more functionality and costs more, so you have even more reason to get a nice case for it. Choose the best iPhone 16e case for your needs Apple left MagSafe technology out of the new budget-ish iPhone 16e handset. Instead, it supports wireless Qi charging at 7.5 watts (not MagSafe’s faster 15 watts). But you can make your new iPhone 16e stick well to MagSafe charging platforms with a “MagSafe-compatible” case, marked as such below. Or just go with one of the excellent regular cases we recommend for different uses and needs. Table of contents: Best iPhone 16e case Best MagSafe cases for iPhone 16e: Best MagSafe case: Casefity Impact Best leather case Best clear or transparent cases Best tough cases Best kickstand case Best non-MagSafe cases for iPhone 16e: Best wallet case Best Apple case: Apple Silicone Best budget case Best MagSafe case: Casetify Impact Case (MagSafe-compatible) Casetify Impact Cases are tough and come in wide range of designs and colors.Photo: Casetify Casetify’s Impact Case stands out with its vast selection of designs, ranging from black kingsnakes to stamp collections, spring flowers to sunsets — with hundreds more options available. It provides protection from drops of 8+ feet and features side sockets for attaching charms and other accessories. The integrated MagSafe-compatible magnets ensure secure attachment to charging pads, though charging is limited to 7.5W rather than the faster speeds offered by native MagSafe iPhones. Price: $64. Designs and colors Casetify Impact Case for iPhone 16e Casetify says these richly designed and colorful cases are 4X military grade drop tested to 8.2 feet. They're also MagSafe compatible. Pros:Massive selection of designs/colorsDrop protection to 8+ feetMagSafe compatible Buy from: Amazon Best leather MagSafe case Torro Slim Bumper Case Torro Slimline Bumper Case iPhone 16ePhoto: Torro For a leather options, the Torro Slim Bumper Case adds sophisticated style to your iPhone 16e with premium leather construction available in classic black or rich dark brown finishes, with optional monogramming for personalization. Weighing 3.6 ounces, this case maintains a low profile while featuring a soft microfiber lining that provides additional protection for your device, and it remains fully compatible with wireless chargers and accessories. While the Torro case doesn’t advertise specific drop protection ratings and the leather may develop a patina over time with regular use, its combination of elegant aesthetics and practical functionality makes it an excellent choice for those seeking a touch of luxury for their iPhone 16e. Price: $31.99. Elegant Torro Slimline Bumper Case This slim premium leather bumper case brings sophisticated style in black or dark brown colors. It includes a soft microfiber lining, MagSafe compatibility and optional monogramming. Pros:Rich leather develops patina over timeMagSafe compatibleLightweight and scratch-resistantOptional monogramming Cons:Some reinforced cases are tougher Buy from: Amazon Best clear or transparent MagSafe cases Zagg Santa Cruz Snap Zagg Santa Cruz Snap case iPhone 16ePhoto: Zagg For those prioritizing aesthetics and grip, the Zagg Santa Cruz Snap excels on both fronts. Its translucent Retro Blue shell (also available in Hyacinth and Black) enhances the iPhone 16e’s otherwise plain design, while its textured sides provide the most secure grip among all tested cases. The case’s MagSafe compatibility allows for seamless use with wireless charging stands, and it offers solid 13-foot drop protection. The Crystal Palace Snap provides a completely clear alternative but lacks the Santa Cruz’s superior grip and vibrant color options. One minor drawback: since these cases are designed to fit iPhones 13 through 16e, there’s noticeable empty space around the camera bump specifically on the 16e model. Price: $49.99. Secure grip Zagg Santa Cruz Snap Case for iPhone 16e This transparent graphene case with a secure grip features 13-foot drop protection and wireless charging compatibility. Made of 70% recycled material. Pros:13-foot drop protectionWireless charging70% recycled material Buy from: Amazon Spigen Liquid Crystal MagFit Case Spigen Liquid Crystal MagFit for iPhone 16ePhoto: Spigen Spigen’s clear case strikes a balance between protection and display. Its flexible, soft construction allows for easy application and removal while remaining completely transparent to showcase your iPhone 16e’s black or white finish. The integrated MagFit magnetic ring ensures compatibility with MagSafe chargers, though charging is limited to 7.5W. Its slim profile minimizes bulk without sacrificing protection. Price: $16.99. Flexible Spigen Liquid Crystal MagFit case This lightweight MagSafe-compatible case is flexible and crystal clear to show of your handset's finish. Pros:Easy on-offLight and flexibleCompletely transparentMagSafe-compatible Buy from: Amazon Best tough MagSafe cases ESR HaloLock Cyber Tough Case ESR HaloLock Cyber Tough Case for iPhone 16ePhoto: ESR Built for maximum durability, the ESR HaloLock Cyber Tough Case employs a three-layer construction: a hard outer shell, TPE soft middle layer, and inner Poron lining at the corners to absorb impact energy. Raised edges around both the display and camera minimize scratching when placed on surfaces. The case includes MagSafe compatibility for accessory connectivity. Available in red or black, it’s priced at $22.99 from ESR’s online store but frequently discounted on Amazon. Buy from: Amazon UAG Essential Armor iPhone 16e Case UAG Essential Armor case for iPhone 16ePhoto: UAG The Urban Armor Gear (UAG) Essential Armor case strikes an excellent balance at its $40 price point. Its thick corners provide impressive 15-foot drop protection while remaining comfortable to hold. The button covers offer satisfying tactile feedback when adjusting volume, locking the phone or using the action button. Its translucent, honeycomb design adds a subtle splash of color to your iPhone 16e. Like many cases in this roundup, it features a magnetic ring compatible with MagSafe accessories such as battery packs and wallets, addressing one of the iPhone 16e’s limitations. The case comes in cloud blue, olive drab, ash, rose or black colors. Price: $39.95. 15-ft drop protection UAG Essential Armor iPhone 16e case This rugged case features translucent design and 15-foot drop protection. It's MagSafe compatible and comes in five colors. Pros:15-foot drop protection5 translucent colorsMagSafe compatible Cons:Not a budget pick at $40 Buy from: Amazon Best kickstand MagSafe case Torras Ostand Spin Torras Ostand Spin case for iPhone 16ePhoto: Torras The Torras Ostand Spin is perfect for video call enthusiasts and on-the-go streamers. Its standout feature is a built-in ring that pops out and rotates a full 360 degrees, allowing you to position your iPhone at any angle in both portrait and landscape orientations. When not in use, the ring sits flush with the case. The Ostand provides military-grade drop protection and full MagSafe compatibility. The limited color selection (only two options) is its main drawback for the style-conscious. Price: $49.99 (but currently marked down 20% to $39.99, plus an additional $3 off coupon to make it $36.99). Solid kickstand Torras Ostand Spin Case for iPhone 16e Torras is known for its durable, rotating kickstand ring. It pops out to let you position your handset however you like. The case is also drop-tested to military grade and MagSafe compatible. Pros:Built-in kickstandStand good for portrait and landscape modesDrop testedMagSafe compatible Cons:Limited color choice Buy from: Amazon Best non-MagSafe cases for iPhone 16e Best wallet case Smartish Wallet Slayer Vol. 1 Smartish Wallet Slayer Vol. 1Photo: Smartish The Smartish Wallet Slayer Vol. 1 transforms your iPhone 16e into an all-in-one solution for your everyday carry, featuring secure slots that accommodate up to three credit cards plus cash with an easy-access design that allows you to slide out cards when needed. Constructed from a blend of synthetic rubber, plastic, polycarbonate and thermoplastic polyurethane, this case offers substantial 6-foot drop protection while coming in various colors and patterns to match your style. The only notable drawback is that the integrated wallet design prevents compatibility with magnetic accessories and wireless charging, requiring you to either use a cable or temporarily remove the case when you want to charge wirelessly. Price: $24.99. Buy from: Amazon Best Apple case: Apple Silicone Apple Silicone Case for iPhone 16e in winter blue.Photo: Apple You can’t go far wrong with the iPhone giant’s own case for its new handset. While your new iPhone 16e is either black or white, these flexible cases come with color — winter blue, lake green and fuschia, in addition to black and white. The silicone is grippy and easy to hold, although you might find it smudges a bit. And these cases lack MagSafe compatibility, so no magnetism included. But they’re made with 55% recycled material, so you can feel good about that. And the price is decent, at under $50, and you know the low-profile case will fit your on your iPhone and in your pocket perfectly. Price: $39.99. Grippy Apple Silicone Case for iPhone 16e Apple's own Silicone Case for iPhone 16e is a guaranteed good fit for the handset. It comes in five colors: black, white, winter blue, lake green and fuschia. Pros:Light, flexible and grippyAdds color to iPhone 16e55% recycled material Cons:Might smudge a bitNo MagSafe Buy from: Amazon Best budget case Ringke Onyx Ringke Onyx case for iPhone 16ePhoto: Ringke Ringke’s Onyx case delivers impressive protection without breaking the bank, offering a slim-fitting thermoplastic polyurethane design with grippy sides and a fingerprint-resistant textured back. Available in black, camo, green, and grey color options, this lightweight 1.1 oz case includes convenient attachment points for wrist straps and accessories while maintaining compatibility with wireless charging in its base model. Though it doesn’t specify exact drop protection ratings, the Onyx provides reliable everyday protection against basic wear and tear, and budget-conscious shoppers can upgrade to a MagSafe-compatible version for just a few dollars more while still keeping the total cost under $20. Price: $14.99. Anti-fingerprint Ringke Onyx iPhone 16e Case The slim Onyx feels good in the hand, with a non-slip grip and anti-fingerprint technology. It features precise camera cutouts. Pros:Slim design with grippy sidesAnti-fingerprint textured backCompatible with wireless charging Cons:No drop ratingPay more for MagSafe versions Buy from: Amazon
html:
• Buying guides

If you got or will soon get an iPhone 16e, way to go! The new iPhone 16e has plenty to recommend it, even if lacks MagSafe and it’s not as affordable, at $599, as the discontinued SE model it replaces. iPhone 16e boasts more functionality and costs more, so you have even more reason to get a nice case for it.

Choose the best iPhone 16e case for your needs

Apple left MagSafe technology out of the new budget-ish iPhone 16e handset. Instead, it supports wireless Qi charging at 7.5 watts (not MagSafe’s faster 15 watts). But you can make your new iPhone 16e stick well to MagSafe charging platforms with a “MagSafe-compatible” case, marked as such below. Or just go with one of the excellent regular cases we recommend for different uses and needs.

Table of contents: Best iPhone 16e case

Best MagSafe cases for iPhone 16e:

  • Best MagSafe case: Casefity Impact
  • Best leather case
  • Best clear or transparent cases
  • Best tough cases
  • Best kickstand case

Best non-MagSafe cases for iPhone 16e:

  • Best wallet case
  • Best Apple case: Apple Silicone
  • Best budget case

Best MagSafe case: Casetify Impact Case (MagSafe-compatible)

Casetify’s Impact Case stands out with its vast selection of designs, ranging from black kingsnakes to stamp collections, spring flowers to sunsets — with hundreds more options available. It provides protection from drops of 8+ feet and features side sockets for attaching charms and other accessories. The integrated MagSafe-compatible magnets ensure secure attachment to charging pads, though charging is limited to 7.5W rather than the faster speeds offered by native MagSafe iPhones. Price: $64.

Designs and colors

Casetify Impact Case for iPhone 16e

Casetify says these richly designed and colorful cases are 4X military grade drop tested to 8.2 feet. They're also MagSafe compatible.

Pros:

  • Massive selection of designs/colors
  • Drop protection to 8+ feet
  • MagSafe compatible

Buy from: Amazon

Best leather MagSafe case

Torro Slim Bumper Case

For a leather options, the Torro Slim Bumper Case adds sophisticated style to your iPhone 16e with premium leather construction available in classic black or rich dark brown finishes, with optional monogramming for personalization. Weighing 3.6 ounces, this case maintains a low profile while featuring a soft microfiber lining that provides additional protection for your device, and it remains fully compatible with wireless chargers and accessories. While the Torro case doesn’t advertise specific drop protection ratings and the leather may develop a patina over time with regular use, its combination of elegant aesthetics and practical functionality makes it an excellent choice for those seeking a touch of luxury for their iPhone 16e. Price: $31.99.

Elegant

Torro Slimline Bumper Case

This slim premium leather bumper case brings sophisticated style in black or dark brown colors. It includes a soft microfiber lining, MagSafe compatibility and optional monogramming.

Pros:

  • Rich leather develops patina over time
  • MagSafe compatible
  • Lightweight and scratch-resistant
  • Optional monogramming

Cons:

  • Some reinforced cases are tougher

Buy from: Amazon

Best clear or transparent MagSafe cases

Zagg Santa Cruz Snap

For those prioritizing aesthetics and grip, the Zagg Santa Cruz Snap excels on both fronts. Its translucent Retro Blue shell (also available in Hyacinth and Black) enhances the iPhone 16e’s otherwise plain design, while its textured sides provide the most secure grip among all tested cases. The case’s MagSafe compatibility allows for seamless use with wireless charging stands, and it offers solid 13-foot drop protection. The Crystal Palace Snap provides a completely clear alternative but lacks the Santa Cruz’s superior grip and vibrant color options. One minor drawback: since these cases are designed to fit iPhones 13 through 16e, there’s noticeable empty space around the camera bump specifically on the 16e model. Price: $49.99.

Secure grip

Zagg Santa Cruz Snap Case for iPhone 16e

This transparent graphene case with a secure grip features 13-foot drop protection and wireless charging compatibility. Made of 70% recycled material.

Pros:

  • 13-foot drop protection
  • Wireless charging
  • 70% recycled material

Buy from: Amazon

Spigen Liquid Crystal MagFit Case

Spigen’s clear case strikes a balance between protection and display. Its flexible, soft construction allows for easy application and removal while remaining completely transparent to showcase your iPhone 16e’s black or white finish. The integrated MagFit magnetic ring ensures compatibility with MagSafe chargers, though charging is limited to 7.5W. Its slim profile minimizes bulk without sacrificing protection. Price: $16.99.

Flexible

Spigen Liquid Crystal MagFit case

This lightweight MagSafe-compatible case is flexible and crystal clear to show of your handset's finish.

Pros:

  • Easy on-off
  • Light and flexible
  • Completely transparent
  • MagSafe-compatible

Buy from: Amazon

Best tough MagSafe cases

ESR HaloLock Cyber Tough Case

Built for maximum durability, the ESR HaloLock Cyber Tough Case employs a three-layer construction: a hard outer shell, TPE soft middle layer, and inner Poron lining at the corners to absorb impact energy. Raised edges around both the display and camera minimize scratching when placed on surfaces. The case includes MagSafe compatibility for accessory connectivity. Available in red or black, it’s priced at $22.99 from ESR’s online store but frequently discounted on Amazon.

Buy from: Amazon

UAG Essential Armor iPhone 16e Case

The Urban Armor Gear (UAG) Essential Armor case strikes an excellent balance at its $40 price point. Its thick corners provide impressive 15-foot drop protection while remaining comfortable to hold. The button covers offer satisfying tactile feedback when adjusting volume, locking the phone or using the action button. Its translucent, honeycomb design adds a subtle splash of color to your iPhone 16e. Like many cases in this roundup, it features a magnetic ring compatible with MagSafe accessories such as battery packs and wallets, addressing one of the iPhone 16e’s limitations. The case comes in cloud blue, olive drab, ash, rose or black colors. Price: $39.95.

15-ft drop protection

UAG Essential Armor iPhone 16e case

This rugged case features translucent design and 15-foot drop protection. It's MagSafe compatible and comes in five colors.

Pros:

  • 15-foot drop protection
  • 5 translucent colors
  • MagSafe compatible

Cons:

  • Not a budget pick at $40

Buy from: Amazon

Best kickstand MagSafe case

Torras Ostand Spin

The Torras Ostand Spin is perfect for video call enthusiasts and on-the-go streamers. Its standout feature is a built-in ring that pops out and rotates a full 360 degrees, allowing you to position your iPhone at any angle in both portrait and landscape orientations. When not in use, the ring sits flush with the case. The Ostand provides military-grade drop protection and full MagSafe compatibility. The limited color selection (only two options) is its main drawback for the style-conscious. Price: $49.99 (but currently marked down 20% to $39.99, plus an additional $3 off coupon to make it $36.99).

Solid kickstand

Torras Ostand Spin Case for iPhone 16e

Torras is known for its durable, rotating kickstand ring. It pops out to let you position your handset however you like. The case is also drop-tested to military grade and MagSafe compatible.

Pros:

  • Built-in kickstand
  • Stand good for portrait and landscape modes
  • Drop tested
  • MagSafe compatible

Cons:

  • Limited color choice

Buy from: Amazon

Best non-MagSafe cases for iPhone 16e

Best wallet case

Smartish Wallet Slayer Vol. 1

The Smartish Wallet Slayer Vol. 1 transforms your iPhone 16e into an all-in-one solution for your everyday carry, featuring secure slots that accommodate up to three credit cards plus cash with an easy-access design that allows you to slide out cards when needed. Constructed from a blend of synthetic rubber, plastic, polycarbonate and thermoplastic polyurethane, this case offers substantial 6-foot drop protection while coming in various colors and patterns to match your style. The only notable drawback is that the integrated wallet design prevents compatibility with magnetic accessories and wireless charging, requiring you to either use a cable or temporarily remove the case when you want to charge wirelessly. Price: $24.99.

Buy from: Amazon

Best Apple case: Apple Silicone

You can’t go far wrong with the iPhone giant’s own case for its new handset. While your new iPhone 16e is either black or white, these flexible cases come with color — winter blue, lake green and fuschia, in addition to black and white. The silicone is grippy and easy to hold, although you might find it smudges a bit. And these cases lack MagSafe compatibility, so no magnetism included. But they’re made with 55% recycled material, so you can feel good about that. And the price is decent, at under $50, and you know the low-profile case will fit your on your iPhone and in your pocket perfectly. Price: $39.99.

Grippy

Apple Silicone Case for iPhone 16e

Apple's own Silicone Case for iPhone 16e is a guaranteed good fit for the handset. It comes in five colors: black, white, winter blue, lake green and fuschia.

Pros:

  • Light, flexible and grippy
  • Adds color to iPhone 16e
  • 55% recycled material

Cons:

  • Might smudge a bit
  • No MagSafe

Buy from: Amazon

Best budget case

Ringke Onyx

Ringke’s Onyx case delivers impressive protection without breaking the bank, offering a slim-fitting thermoplastic polyurethane design with grippy sides and a fingerprint-resistant textured back. Available in black, camo, green, and grey color options, this lightweight 1.1 oz case includes convenient attachment points for wrist straps and accessories while maintaining compatibility with wireless charging in its base model. Though it doesn’t specify exact drop protection ratings, the Onyx provides reliable everyday protection against basic wear and tear, and budget-conscious shoppers can upgrade to a MagSafe-compatible version for just a few dollars more while still keeping the total cost under $20. Price: $14.99.

Anti-fingerprint

Ringke Onyx iPhone 16e Case

The slim Onyx feels good in the hand, with a non-slip grip and anti-fingerprint technology. It features precise camera cutouts.

Pros:

  • Slim design with grippy sides
  • Anti-fingerprint textured back
  • Compatible with wireless charging

Cons:

  • No drop rating
  • Pay more for MagSafe versions

Buy from: Amazon
